snippet.title: Cyber Storm Edge - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A Retro Fast-Paced 2D Platformer for PC! It's now available on Itch (link below)!! It will be costing just 2$ and it's my second commercial game that I've worked on as a solo indie developer! Fight against Cyber Space Pirates!

Get the game here: https://thiago-avidos.itch.io/cyber-storm-edge

Here follows the game's description:



In a distant universe, where the Cyber Space is the true reality, Space Pirates reign over the world. The Cyber Storm, the most famous and rich space pirates ever have just gotten hold of the planet's core, and now are threatening the entire world!

But there exists hope... You, Edge, former pirate of the Cyber Storm, decided to go against them and protect the planet... alone.


It'll first be available at Itch.io for Windows.
I'll expand to Gamejolt, Steam and possibly Linux as soon as possible!

More details will be available at my Itch.io page, Twitter and Instagram!
